typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		description as string,
		displayName as string,
		fullname as string,
		type as string,
		createdAt as timestamp,
		updatedAt as timestamp,
		status as string,
		level as integer,
		score as string,
		rev as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceLeanIXApplicationSQLDB
SourceLeanIXApplicationSQLDB lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
